text: Decap Attack is a 1991 platform side-scrolling game developed for the Sega Genesis. https://twitter.com/SEGAForever/status/926516347739234305 It focuses upon the main protagonist Chuck D. Head who is a demented mummy. His mission is to defeat the evil demon named Max D. Cap who came from the underworld with his army to invade the world. The stages are set as body parts that make up a human skeleton from Abdomainland, El Beau Island, Tibuland, Armington, Pumpington, The Last Leg, and Eyeland. As soon as Chuck D. Head completes his mission he is congratulated by scientist Frank N. Stein and transformed Chuck into a human boy as a reward. == References == Category:1991 video games Category:Horror video games Category:Platform games Category:Sega Genesis games Category:Sega video games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Decap Attack
